sourcesContent:
import Footer from "../../components/footer/footer.component"; import Slide from 'react-reveal/Slide'; const AppointmentSetter = () => { return (

Appointment Setter Responsibilities

As an appointment setter, you are expected to work with the lead generator to identify potential clients, reaching out to them, and scheduling an appointment directed to the sales team of Intercom Staffing for a follow-up. Not only that but aside from organizing an appointment schedule, an appointment setter also makes it sure that partnering with Intercom Staffing is a positive experience. Additional responsibilities and duties of an appointment setter are as follows:

  • Taking the time to learn about the company at its very core.
  • Organizing and determining which appointments is a priority.
  • Facilitate and distribute appointment reports.
  • Convert incoming phone calls to appointments by preferably 50% or more.
  • Contact prospective clients who have not been contacted.
  • Properly explain Intercom Staffing services to prospects when making appointments.
  • Keep a tally of customer complaints, questions, and concerns about Intercom Staffing services.

Educational Requirements - An appointment setter has at least a high school diploma or GED. Although it is recommended to have at least a bachelorâ€™s degree in marketing, advertising or any relevant courses.

Experience Requirements - Having at least a proven appointment setter background or experience in similar roles are preferable as any experience specific to the industry or service will contribute to the success of an Appointment Setter candidate since it demonstrates existing knowledge to support booking goals and objectives.

) } export default AppointmentSetter;
